H0.text: Which classical author wrote the Anabasis. Herodotus

H1.text: Which classical author wrote the Anabasis. Thucydides

H2.text: Which classical author wrote the Anabasis. Polybius

H3.text: Which classical author wrote the Anabasis. Xenofon

A4.text: Xenophon describes his life in 401 BC and 400 BC in the memoir Anabasis.

A5.text: Xenophon's book Anabasis is his record of the expedition of Cyrus the Younger and the return of Greek mercenaries after Cyrus's death in the Battle of Cunaxa.
